name: Michigan: Report from Hell
description: One day, a heavy fog descends upon the city of Chicago. Within hours, the whole city is engulfed in the mysterious mist. In a move of panic, the government calls for an immediate evacuation of the entire city and for everyone to seek refuge where possible. However, the fog continues to slowly spread across the country. The government is dumbfounded and without an answer as to what the cause is. Enter the ZAKA TV crew, who, sensing a good story is brewing is dedicated to provide a full blown coverage of the phenomenon on site. They head to Chicago, knowing this could be the moment they have all been waiting for in their careers. However... they weren't exactly prepared for what was waiting for them once they arrived...
